extendedInfo.description: [ Sing Sing Story for kids ]From the makers of Sing Sing Together comes another new app for kids.Itâs called Sing Sing Story for Kids! Watch the animated fairy tale stories with your child. Then, sing along to the song at the end of the story. The cute characters from Sing Sing Together will also dance along with you. Donât you think your child will love it? Itâs an app that teaches your child English, while he/she is having fun!Give your child this gift.[Objectives and target]The objective of this app is to make your childâs first encounter with English fun and exciting.Children learn English through fun songs and dance routines. This app is aimed at kindergarten and elementary students that are learning English for the first time.Sing Sing Story is for children that need numerous activities, like chants and songs.[Characteristics of the App]There are 3D videos of stories, chants, animations, and dance routines for children all ages to follow.The more popular the fairy tale, the easier and more fun it is for the children to learn English. reviews.comment: Red shoes story is horrible. Why would you create a story about a kid saying \'no\' to parents and grandparents. Unistalled because of this.
reviews.author: Joseph Mazey
